testcase.classname: feature to test login functionality to Swag Labs
testcase.name: Verify login page
testcase.system-out: Given User has opened swag labs browser.....................................passed Then There are fields for inputting username and password that have not been filled in.passed And There is a Swag Labs logo name..........................................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test login functionality to Swag Labs
testcase.name: Verify if login is successful with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User has opened swag labs browser.....................................passed When User enter username as "standard_user" and password as "secret_sauce"..passed And User click login button.................................................passed Then User should be able to see Dashboard Page..............................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test login functionality to Swag Labs
testcase.name: Verify if login is unsuccessful with invalid credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User has opened swag labs browser.....................................passed When User enter username as "standard_user" and password as ""..............passed And User click login button.................................................passed Then Showing symbol red x in the "password".................................passed And Showing Error message "Epic sadface: Password is required"..............passed And Stay on the login page..................................................passed And The label and border in the "password" field are red....................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test login functionality to Swag Labs
testcase.name: Verify if login is unsuccessful with invalid credentials - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given User has opened swag labs browser.....................................passed When User enter username as "" and password as "secret_sauce"...............passed And User click login button.................................................passed Then Showing symbol red x in the "username".................................passed And Showing Error message "Epic sadface: Username is required"..............passed And Stay on the login page..................................................passed And The label and border in the "username" field are red....................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test login functionality to Swag Labs

testcase.name: Verify if login is unsuccessful with invalid credentials - Example #1.4
